definitions.title: n.pr.m. 1.
definitions.body: king of Ammon 1Sa 11:1, 1Sa 11:1, 1Sa 11:2, 1Sa 12:12, 2Sa 10:2, 1Ch 19:1, 1Ch 19:2; perh. also 2Sa 17:27; LXX Naav.
father of Abigail and Zeruiah 2Sa 17:25, si vera l.: LXX Naav, but LXXL Iessai (cf. 1Ch 2:16); We:Gesch. 2. 57 Anm. 1 Löhr defend [[נחשׁ]]; dub. We:Sm HPS.
giving name to a city, ´[[עִיר נ]] 1Ch 4:12, LXX po/lewv Naav; LXXL Hrnaav.
